title: MMR system
body: Ok so from what I think I know is that Mmr determines what players you meet in solo queue. So high Mmr expect to meet higher ranked and skilled players. When losing a game does your Mmr fall based on your overall grade/performance. Well usually for me it's not entirely my fault for losing the game. It's more like my teammates do, either bot lane dies constantly or a single lane keeps on feeding - seems intentionally. I'm wondering if it's possible to keep a high or positive Mmr if your win to lose ratio is something like 70W-76L. I think when you lose more than you win you kinda vs lower skilled players both practically (skills) and mentally (attitude). Basically most players get punished (lose games, loss of a lot of lp) because of their teammates..... and for that you get put into even worser, cancerous games. I guess I'm saying that your Mmr shouldn't drop so heavily because of your teammates performance in which you lose the game. Any thoughts??

replies.body: 406W 396L and my MMR is normal as g4 but i still meet s4/5 a lot idk how bcoz RIOT match making is broken
Also, say you get an S and you lose a game. I suppose the Mmr drop would be a little since you performed well. I think.
